meanings.sent1: The gibbous balloon floated high in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The gibbous moon shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The gibbous pumpkin looked comically round.
meanings.sent4: Her gibbous cheeks resembled ripe apples.
meanings.sent5: The gibbous belly of the bumblebee was full of nectar.

meanings.definition: Having a hump or rounded elevation.
meanings.sent1: The gibbous hill overlooked the entire valley.
meanings.sent2: The gibbous camel walked gracefully across the desert.
meanings.sent3: The gibbous pillow made for an awkward nap.
meanings.sent4: The gibbous turtle shell provided protection.
meanings.sent5: The gibbous backpack bulged with school books.

meanings.sent1: His gibbous ankle was wrapped in a bandage.
meanings.sent2: The gibbous river flooded its banks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The gibbous balloon popped due to overinflation.
meanings.sent4: The gibbous cloud signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The gibbous fruit was ripe and ready to eat.
